game_plan.overview: Pong is a classic two-player arcade game where players control paddles to hit a ball back and forth, aiming to score points by getting the ball past the opponent's paddle.
game_plan.mechanics: Two players control paddles on either side of the screen, attempting to hit a ball back to their opponent. Players can move their paddles up or down, and the game can be paused with the 'P' key.
